title: Install the toolchain
description: The [Zephyr Getting Started for Windows](https://docs.zephyrproject.org/latest/getting_started/installation_win.html#installing-requirements-and-dependencies) describes how to install the required tools. The easiest way  is detailed below.
Complete the following steps to install the toolchain using the [Chocolatey package manager](https://chocolatey.org/)

steps.title: Install Chocolatey
steps.description: Install Chocolatey by following the [installation instructions on the Chocolatey website](https://chocolatey.org/install).

steps.title: Open admin cmd.exe
steps.description: Open a command prompt (`cmd.exe`) as **Administrator**. To do so, click the Windows start symbol, enter `cmd.exe` in the search field, then right-click the result and choose **Run as Administrator**.

steps.title: Install cross compiler toolchain for ARM
description: Download and install the latest GNU ARM Embedded toolchain to be able to cross-compile for ARM targets. It is available on the [ARM developer website](https://developer.arm.com/open-source/gnu-toolchain/gnu-rm/downloads).
We recommend to install the toolchain into the `c:\gnuarmemb` folder.
